website_summaries.verdict: One of the more powerful Troy-Bilt lawn mowers for those with larger yards to tackle.
pros: Upgraded motor includes a 190cc Honda engine with all-wheel drive
Offers a lot of traction and power
Treaded front and rear tires grip on various types of terrain
cons: Some of the plastic accessories can be knocked loose or off during normal use

customer_reviews.title: Great self propelled mower the individual front or rear wheel ...
customer_reviews.text: Great self propelled mower the individual front or rear wheel drive is excellent the 4X4 with both engaged is unstopable
customer_reviews.author: KMYR/FL

customer_reviews.title: Turned a chore into fun!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought property with a large sloped yard. Originally thought of a riding mower but enjoy the exercise of a walking mower. A friend found this on Amazon, did some minor research, bought the mower and couldn't be happier. It's a powerful beast for sure and the 4 wheel drive makes the job so much easier. Easy to learn, started the first time. Had a blast mowing.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great product on the hills.
customer_reviews.text: This product was great, cut my whole lawn on one tank of fuel. Was a little heavy , but thankfully the 4WD really works on this mower as we have some steep slopes in our garden
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast and effective!
customer_reviews.text: This mower is actually self propelled. The one we had before, you had to push it. This one is light, but powerful. Easy to start. Our yard used to take close to two hours to mow. I am done in an hour now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Mower
customer_reviews.text: The mower is the best I have ever owned. Easy set up and after a a few uses still starts with one pull.
customer_reviews.author: RTL

customer_reviews.title: WOW!  4WD is worth it!
customer_reviews.text: So far, this mower is amazing! Pulls me up hills and all over my rather large yard. Starts right away. Cuts through thick, wet grass with ease, easy to assemble. Takes a bit to get the hang of how much power to give front and rear wheels, but I had it down within a half an hour.
customer_reviews.author: RAD

customer_reviews.title: Condition not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Condition was not accurate. Mower was missing hardware, damaged, and stripped screw holes. Seller wanted me to return it, but did not have another one to replace it. I was in need of the mower so I choose to keep it hoping it would last. Asked for a partial refund which was denied. Would not buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Big items have a tendency to be banged up.
customer_reviews.text: It came a little bent up. But, I was able to correct the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoyed cutting my lawn with this mower.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the easy starter. Liked the easy change of accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Happy great grandfather

customer_reviews.title: Leaving A Trail Of Plastic Parts Behind Me As I Mowed
customer_reviews.text: The plastic grass chute falls off at the slightest nudge from a bush, tree, or other obstacle. I have to stop the mower, tip it up on it's side, to put the chute back on. The plastic air filter cover also falls off several times per mowing of the yard, and the rubber flap at the rear of the mower deck, (by your feet) that is supposed to deflect flying rocks and other debris into the ground, instead of letting them fly into your foot, or ankle, got ripped off and broken the first time I used the mower, when it caught on uneven ground. I could build better stuff than this.
customer_reviews.author: NeverGrewUp
